content: flight of the advent knit feather flight of the advent knit feather dk & sock these knit feathers work up quickly and provide a great way to use small amounts of yarn you re likely to be left with after putting your advent calendar to use use any color you want pair 2-3 scraps experiment with stripes whatever you do it s going to be beautiful consider using them individually as keychains bookmarks etc include them along with tassels on the ends of a scarf or shawl or join lots them together for a full project made of feathers i d love to see your creations © 2024 jay s fiber studio 1 flight of the advent knit feather yarn & needles you ll follow the same pattern for either dk or sock weight yarn with dk obviously resulting in a larger feather gauge is not important below is my needle size recommendation but choose what feels right to you yardage varies but the maximum you should need for a single feather if worked as the large version is 15 yds dk weight us 4 3 00mm sock weight us 2 2 75mm substitutions if you wish to use a different yarn weight you should be able to follow the pattern instructions with an appropriate needle size however note that both the finished size and required yardage will vary notes if you plan to join multiple feathers together or attach them to something else leave long tails to use as you join the work otherwise you can weave in your ends and it s ready to go blocking is completely optional the pattern is the same for both yarn weights but you re able to choose a small or large version both versions begin the same but where the small feather begins decreasing you ll continue another increase section for the large version abbreviations & definitions cdd centered double decrease see note below co cast on i-cord i-cord a stretchy tube knit from a small number of stitches k knit k2tog knit 2 together right-leaning decrease kfb knit front and back increase p purl sl slip ssk slip slip knit left-leaning decrease st s stitch es special stitches cdd centered double decrease slip 2 stitches together knitwise as if to k2tog knit the next stitch then pass the 2 slipped stitches over the stitch you ve just knit
